name: Ground Beef with Cheese
description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb delight with our Ground Beef with Cheese recipe. This healthy reinterpretation of classic comfort food is perfect for those pursuing a nutritious lifestyle without sacrificing flavor. Dive into the richness of ground beef, complemented by the creamy texture of cheese and the freshness of cherry tomatoes and lemon juice. A delight for anyone looking to enjoy Healthy Recipes while keeping their meals delicious and satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Cherry Tomatoes under cold water and cut them in halves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the Cauliflower into small florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, melt the Butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Ground Beef to the skillet and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cut Cauliflower to the skillet, cover, and cook until tender, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Cherry Tomatoes, Creme Cheese Spread, Salt, Black Pepper, and Lemon Juice. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Gradually mix in the Milk to achieve a creamy texture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture into a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
